溵字的基本解释

溵
yīn
水名。
中国唐代州名：“十一月，以郾城县置溵州”。

溵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於斤切，平欣，影。］
同“1”。
水名。出河南省登封县少室山，东流入颍水。

溵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溵； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页641第03
【廣韻】【集韻】?於斤切，音殷。與濦㶏同。水名，在潁川。詳濦字註。

溵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
溵字的起名意思

水名，也指唐代州名。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
yīn
Water name.
The name of the prefecture in Tang Dynasty in China: "In November, Xunzhou was established in Licheng County."
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, Pingxin, Shadow. ]
Same as "1".
Water name. Out of Shaoshi Mountain in Dengfeng County, Henan Province, it flows into Yingshui in the east.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　溵; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 641 03
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Jinqie, the sound is vivid. Same as 濦㶏. The name of the water is in Yingchuan. Detailed note of the word.

Name meaning
The name of water also refers to the name of the state in the Tang Dynasty.
yīn
собств. геогр. (сокр. вм. 溵水) Иньшуй (река в пров. Хэнань и Аньхой)
